alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seminole, northeastern Lake, Brevard, southeastern Orange, Volusia and Osceola Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near DeLeon Springs to Christmas to Harmony to 8 miles south of Saint Cloud. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Palm Bay, Deltona, Melbourne, and Daytona Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors! These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
